sections.summary:
Diverse, results-oriented graphic designer with over 30 years of experience in print, logo design, and dimensional signs. Passionate about
comprehensive, strategic and brand-building design. Demonstrated ability to work both independently as well as collaborate in large design teams.
Flexible, big picture, out-of-the-box thinker and expert brain-stormer, with special emphasis on conceptual design.
Highlights
Adobe CC Suite
Graphic Design Expertise
Strategic Planning
Creative Design Aptitude
Training and Development
Quality Assurance
Corporate Design
Â Team Leadership

Accomplishments
Successfully orchestrated complex projects from the idea stage through design, mock-up, and final rendering to meet customer
expectations, while building customer loyalty.
Grew client base through strategic relationship building and consistently delivering successful campaigns and designs.
